TopicTitle: v13 custom sounds stopped working - FIXED in 13.1!!!

Articles.Content:
Happy Christmas all,

Any ideas folks?

I had a few parts with custom sounds and they have all stopped working when I switched up to v13.

The docs still say its sound_soundname.wav and put it in the part/sounds folder so unless the docs are now out of date, its the same method as before.

anybody shed any light on this?

mat
I could never get custom sounds to work. was there a specific format they had to be in sound wise or something?
They were working with v12 so i guess the usage has changed slightly.
Dis\' be confirmed. Doesn\'t work here either. What a shame.

The 0.13 loader optimizations did include some changes to the custom sound loading system. It\'s quite likely it\'s stopped working.

I can fix it for the 0.13.1 release.. I just need to know what exactly happens when the sound fails to load. Does it give an error message? Or does it default to a stock sound?

If it\'s the latter, then it should be fixable by giving the sound file another name. If not, then we need to do some testing to see just what\'s going on.

Cheers
Just had a chance to try this and it doesnt play a sound on the event (not even the default). No error message either.
Custom sounds working again in 13.1 excellent stuff!
They work, but I\'m getting spurious error consoles regarding failed custom sounds without any indication as to what is causing that sound.
